name: Captain Purrcard - Space Panik
description:
Captain Purrcard is out on a mission is space, but his onboard AI has gone rogue and taken control of the ships engines!

With his paws at the helm, Captain Purrcard must navigate through storms of enemies and a huge asteroid belt! Can you make it home, or will you perish at the hands of the very computer that's supposed to protect you?

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Unfortunately, due to real life commitments, the total time spent on programming was only around 14 hours, so it's very unpolished. I will try and get more of the wanted features implemented after the game Jam.

Note for future GMTK Game Jammers - Don't try and implement a game engine AND make a game in such a short time period if you only have one programmer!
